name: Olla's ADVENTURE
description:
Olla's ADVENTURE is a short game created in approximately two days by a team of five people who worked together in the ''Bucaramanga Game Jam 2019''. The aim of this project was to take an endemic sample of the Colombian culture, and portray it in a fantastic way.

Our game is about a family that goes in a ''Paseo de Olla'' where the main character Aunt Yajaira has to prepare a Sancocho, and keep her family away from the dangers of nature while she prepares the food.
